jecalculation.command.help.list: 以下是可用的指令列表：

jecalculation.chat.server_mode: 模組未在客戶端工作，因此你不能在沒有計算機的情況下開啟介面
jecalculation.chat.help:
/jeca craft - 開啟合成計算機
/jeca math - 開啟數學計算機
jecalculation.gui.craft.help: 歡迎來到本模組的主要介面。建議你先使用右上角的兩個按鈕輸入配方，以創建和編輯配方。所有需要計算機的配方將被記錄。......(可利用此部分)

jecalculation.gui.recipe.title: Recipe Editing
jecalculation.gui.recipe.help: This interface allows you to create or edit recipes. To create one recipe, you can pick items from the JEI item list, then put it into the slots. When finished, simply click the save button. You can also fast transer recipes from JEI by clicking "+" when openning recipe view. To edit one label, you can simply click it, then a toolbar will pop up to help you, where you can switch between amount and percentage mode, type the amount, or remove the label. In addition, you can use mouse scroll to quickly change the amount. Clicking the "Clear" button will remove all of the labels. Using recipe fast transfer, some labels will automatically setup for you, like oreDict labels. If you do not want this behavoir, simply use "Disambiguous" button to select manually. You can also add labels by ckicking the "Add label" button. By the way, normally you shouldn't put fuzzy labels as output. You can easily manage recipes using groups. Click the "New group" button, type the group name and hit the tick, you are done. The new group name will show in the top bar. If you already have groups set up and you want to use an existing one, you can use the arrows to select between them. When you are editing an existing recipe, you will have two extra buttons, "Save as" and "Delete". "Save as" allows you to save the current recipe as a new recipe, without changing the existing one. "Delete" simply allows you to delete the recipe.
jecalculation.gui.label.title: Label Editing
jecalculation.gui.label.help: This interface allows you to create labels. This mod provides 4 types of labels: fluid, oreDict, placeholder and item. To create fluid and oreDict label, you can just search and pick. Item labels represent an item stack, but with fuzzy options for meta, nbt and capalibity. As is indicated by the name, Placeholder labels do not hold any content. It is just a string to connect recipes. You can use it for anything, like structure or event energy. To create one, simply type in the name, then hit the tick. You can also search and pick from existing ones.
jecalculation.gui.search.export_all.disa: Cannot export because no recipe recorded
jecalculation.gui.search.title: Recipe Management
jecalculation.gui.search.help: This interface allows you to search, import and export recipes. Simply click the item to edit or delete the recipe. The two buttons in upper left will be helpful if you want to import or export recipes.
jecalculation.gui.search.rename.disabled:
Rename options only available
when one group selected
jecalculation.gui.search.confirm.disable:
New name cannot be empty
or the same as existing ones
jecalculation.gui.import.title: Recipe Import
jecalculation.gui.import.help: This interface allows you to import recipes. First place exported data files into "config/JustEnoughCalculation/data/", then you will see them in the list organized as "filename/group" if there is no error (otherwise check the log). Use the buttons to select recipe groups to import and hit the tick, then you are done. For pack makers or server owners, you can rename the data file and place it at "config/JustEnoughCalculation/default.json" to set it as default. When player creates world or joins server, the default recipes will be automatically setup for the user.
jecalculation.gui.import.confirm.disable: Cannot import because no record is selected.
jecalculation.gui.item_stack.confirm.dis: Cannot create because no item is chosen
